title: Xenonauts 2 is a comprehensive but overly safe tribute to classic X-COM
description: Expect brutal combat and mounting panic as you save the world from aliens again, but don't expect much that's new.

title: While Halo Infinite struggles for a win, Master Chief Collection is the gift that keeps on giving
description: For longtime fans, the most interesting Halo action is in the past.

title: After more than two years of work, Cyberpunk 2077 finally reaches a 'very positive' user rating on Steam
description: CD Projekt's cyber-RPG faceplanted badly out of the gate, but it’s really come around since then.

title: After 20 years, Major Nelson is leaving Microsoft
description: Larry Hryb says he’s going to "enjoy the Seattle summer" and then move on to other things.

title: Intel may be about to out-AMD AMD in the budget CPU market
description: Intel's Raptor Lake Refresh is pulling from a very familiar playbook if leaked details are correct.

title: Nvidia hasn't done it, so a redditor made an adorable mini RTX 3060 Founders Edition with a 3D printer
description: Sometimes you just gotta do it yourself.

title: Game publisher CEO says talk on monitoring employees with AI was hypothetical and taken out of context: 'We don't use any of these tools for HR'
description: Tinybuild CEO Alex Nichiporchik says a presentation he gave on using AI to detect toxic and burned-out employees was meant to illustrate potential good and bad uses of AI.

title: Fallout co-creator unearths his 20-year-old pitch for Baldur's Gate 3: a first-person action RPG with PvPvE multiplayer
description: Wizards of the Coast was apparently not down with Troika's vison for Baldur's Gate 3.

title: Mortal Kombat 1 roster: all the new and returning characters
description: Klarity on the konfirmed klassic kombatants.

title: Exoprimal has crossplay, but there's a big catch
description: Exoprimal's crossplay currently only works for matchmaking, not for playing with friends.

title: One of Japanese horror's most influential games is getting a remaster and its first official English translation
description: Publisher Limited Run Games has been on a tear of late, and this may be the best offering yet.

title: If you're as obsessed with UFOs and alien abductions as I am, check out They Are Here's chilling prologue demo
description: The truth is out there, so keep your camera at the ready.

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage has a tie-in haptic vest that can beat you up, stab you, axe you, dart you, and combo into a 'severe abdominal wound'
description: "Don't let your enemies get too close or you will feel the consequences."

title: Payday 3 fans lament its inevitable shutdown after Starbreeze confirms transition to always-online: 'This game is on death row'
description: Fans worry about what it means for mods, the game's longevity, and their dodgy internet connections.

title: How to customise your warlock pets in World of Warcraft
description: Where to change their appearance and colour, and how to unlock more options.

title: We gave this game 3 out of 100 in 1994, and now it's getting a remaster
description: Oh no.

title: How to complete When Revenge Burns Green in World of Warcraft
description: Tips on how to defeat Lord Banehollow.

title: Turns out Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart CAN run on a hard drive... thanks to DirectStorage 1.2 on PC
description: This becomes the first DirectStorage 1.2 game with GPU decompression support.

title: The new OneXFly certainly makes the ROG Ally look like a chonky boi
description: This is the lightweight portable handheld gaming PC I've been waiting for.

title: Besieged Disney CCG maker brands suit against it 'the legal equivalent of alchemy' as it plays the hotshot lawyer card
description: Former Wizards of the Coast general counsel Brian Lewis slammed the lawsuit as "more of a PR stunt than a genuine legal dispute."

title: Microsoft has a new default font, which means you do too
description: It's done with the Calibri-ations.

title: Starfield's studio design director pleads for people to stop asking questions because only 'Todd Howard himself is authorised to talk'
description: Emil Pagliarulo took to Twitter to reiterate that he 'simply CAN'T answer 99%' of fan's questions.

title: D&D's upcoming virtual tabletop radiates a big-budget misunderstanding of what matters in role-playing games
description: Wizards of the Coast's bizarre fascination with flashy 3D graphics is a swing and a critical miss.

title: Starfield's vision of the final frontier makes space seem like a boring, barren expanse
description: It might be true to life, but it's not very conducive to fun RPG adventures.

title: Celebrate My Talking Tom’s 10th anniversary with the biggest birthday bash ever
description: The ultimate virtual pet game is now all about the treats.

title: 44 years later, Atari's making a new Lunar Lander game
description: "With precision gravity flier mechanics."

title: Watcher of Realms is a massive RPG offering unique gameplay and a lore to explore
description: With over 100 heroes to collect, unique strategic gameplay opportunities, and a range of playable modes, Watcher of Realms offers something for RPG fans and newcomers alike.

title: WoW's new specialisation deals damage by buffing everyone else, so of course it's getting booted from groups for 'low DPS'
description: The Augmentation Evoker is doing well, players just don't understand it.

title: The first fan-made story for gloomy psych-horror Amnesia: The Bunker is, of course, a Doom mod
description: Regardez, écoutez, et déchirez.

title: Expect dramatic spells and creatures of unusual size in Magic's next set
description: Commander Masters is all about big thrills.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #755: Friday, July 14
description: Get all the help you need with today's Wordle.

title: Asrock announces Z790 and B650E Taichi Lite motherboards, and I hope it's the start of a trend.
description: Less is more.

title: Making Call of Duty a Battle.net exclusive was apparently a 'resounding failure'
description: So argues Microsoft's team of lawyers, but Battle.net's lack of growth during CoD's exclusivity might've been more of a Blizzard problem.
